mapper.select:
select
from sys_labor_cost as laborCost LEFT JOIN sys_labor_cost_details as details on laborCost.labor_cost_id=details.labor_cost_id LEFT JOIN sys_company as company on company.company_id=laborCost.company_id where 1=1
and laborCost.company_id=#{companyId}
and laborCost.year=#{year} and laborCost.status_code!=2 GROUP BY laborCost.labor_cost_id
mapper.update: update sys_labor_cost set year = #{year},month = #{month},company_id = #{companyId} where labor_cost_id = #{laborCostId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_labor_cost (year, month, company_id, create_time ) VALUES (#{laborCostId},#{year},#{month},#{companyId},#{createTime})
